member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_CatchAllInMultiSegment
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A path segment that contains more than one section, such as a literal section or a parameter, cannot contain a catch-all parameter..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_CatchAllMustBeLast
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A catch-all parameter can only appear as the last segment of the route URL..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_ConsecutiveRouteParameters
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A path segment cannot contain two consecutive parameters. They must be separated by a '/' or by a literal string..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_ConsecutiveSeparators
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route URL separator character '/' cannot appear consecutively. It must be separated by either a parameter or a literal value..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_ConstraintTypeCannotBeEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Constraint type cannot be an empty string..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type '{0}' must have a public parameterless constructor to be instantiated using the default factory..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_DuplicateRouteParameterName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route parameter name '{0}' appears more than once in the URL..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_IncompatibleRouteTableProvider
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route table provider type '{0}' must implement the '{1}' interface..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is incomplete escape sequence found in this path segment: '{0}'. Please check the route syntax..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_InvalidRouteHandlerType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route handler type '{0}' must implement the '{1}' interface..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_InvalidRouteParameterName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route parameter name '{0}' is invalid. Route parameter names must be non-empty and cannot contain these characters: '{{', '}}', '[', ']', '/', '?'.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_InvalidRouteVariableName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route variable name '{0}' is invalid. Route variable names must be non-empty and cannot contain these characters: '{{', '}}', '[', ']', '/', '?'.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_MatchingRouteCouldNotBeLocated
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A route that matches the requested values could not be located in the route table..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_NoHttpHandlerFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route handler '{0}' did not return an IHttpHandler from its GetHttpHandler() method..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_NoRouteHandlerFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A RouteHandler must be specified for the selected route..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_NoRouteMatched
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The incoming request does not match any route..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_PersistenceProviderNotInitialized
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Route table provider is not initialized. Please check the configuration file..

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Web.Routing.Resources.Resources.Error_RequiredValueNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The RouteData must contain an item named '{0}' with a non-empty string value..
